title: 111_s1120
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a uniform definition of higher education expenses for purposes of provisions allowing for: (1) penalty-free distributions from individual retirement accounts (IRAs) for education expenses. (2) tax exclusions for the value of college scholarships and for income from US savings bonds used to pay education expenses, (3) the tax deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses, and (4) qualified tuition programs.
